attributes.action: allow  the rest of UK a vote if we want to break away from Scotland
attributes.additional_details: 400 years back Scotland become part of the UK and they are not happy so we will vote to give Scotland their freedom
attributes.background: Scotland have had 1 vote and they voted to remain in UK BUT now the First Minster of Scotland wants a 2nd vote for independents and will keep asking for another vote until they win . I am fed up with Scotland and want to turn the table on them will the people of UK support me
